challenges.title: Coastal Corrosion Resistance
challenges.description: Pompano's coastal geography means outdoor electrical components are at risk from salt air. we use specialized corrosion-resistant hardware for all beachfront and dock installations.

challenges.title: Industrial Power Efficiency
challenges.description: Pompano Beach's large industrial sector requires electricians who understand high-voltage distribution, motor controls, and large-scale LED lighting retrofits.

challenges.title: Historic Neighborhood Modernization
challenges.description: Established residential areas often feature original wiring that needs professional auditing and upgrading to meet modern safety and energy efficiency standards.

faqs.question: Are you licensed to perform electrical work in Pompano Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed (FL License #EC13012419) and insured. We frequently work with the Pompano Beach Building Department on both residential and commercial projects.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency repairs for Pompano waterfront properties?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We offer 24/7 emergency response for all of Pompano Beach, including specialized repairs for dock power, beachfront lighting, and residential failures.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Pompano Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: Pompano Beach—the 'Heart of the Gold Coast'—is a city defined by its beautiful beaches, thriving industrial districts, and historic charm. Solomon Electric is proud to serve this multifaceted community with the highest standard of electrical expertise. Whether you're a long-time resident or a growing business, our team is dedicated to your safety.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Solutions for Pompano Properties
seoContent.body: From the revitalized beachfront to the bustling industrial parks along I-95, Pompano Beach homeowners and businesses count on Solomon Electric. We provide everything from 24/7 emergency repairs to complex panel upgrades and sophisticated lighting design, all backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee.
